title: How to rebind Numpad Enter from using Chat/Console
body:
Can go into a lot of detail, and have been working on this for hours, playing with the SettingsToPersist and PersistentSettings files, and if that detail is necessary, I can update threat with it.

But in short, how do you stop Chat/Console from opening when pressing KP_Enter on the numpad? I've been a Numpad player on PC for 20 years now, and I prefer it.

You can even bind a key to KP_Enter but it will do the function (like Ping or your Ult, etc.) and open up the Chat/Console on the same press.

Anyone know how to do this? Using the console settings from old threads doesn't seem to work, and the overwrite from Server side to the .json files ruins it at anyrate, and Read Only doesn't fix it.

Anyone understand what I am describing and a way to work around it?

Big thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Had the same problem and would love for atleast the numpad enter to be able to change in game but since the same problem happens (rebinding it works but always opens the chat) can't work with that. My solution is perhaps not optimal but it did the job. i wanted the numpad enter to center the camera on champion (this is in the camera menu) and for that i did the following.
Installed sharped keys https://github.com/randyrants/sharpkeys , mapped the numpad enter to other key, (used space because why not ) , ingame, changed the camera do the NumEnter option and voila, works as intended, chat does not open and it does indeed center camera.

https://gyazo.com/95ac1b6bfa156e0c7f949164eb7e7119
https://gyazo.com/5c74ec0edfc939e8e1e358ec1c36d313

Before using sharpkeys, just read the do's and don't before... you really don't want to remap them badly, use as little as possible...

We reached out to our Tech team personally and they said this isn't something that is possible, or if that it was possible it would be more hassle and could cause more issues than it's worth. If you want to chat with them one on one about it though you can submit a[ ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)over.
